sentences.en: A trustworthy person is sb. that you can trust.
sentences.cn: 可靠的人是可以信任的.

sentences.en: Can you engage that all his statements are trustworthy?
sentences.cn: 你能担保他的话都可靠 吗 ?

sentences.en: He is a trustworthy and level-headed leader.
sentences.cn: 他是个头脑冷静、值得信赖的领导。

sentences.en: He is trustworthy ; he always stands by any agreement he makes.
sentences.cn: 他是可靠的, 他总是遵守他的诺言.

sentences.en: He was esteemed ( to be ) trustworthy.
I was deceived into thinking that he was trustworthy.
sentences.cn: 我上当受骗,以为他很可靠.

sentences.en: It is generally admitted that he is a trustworthy person.
sentences.cn: 大家一致公认他是个可信赖的人.

sentences.en: It occurred to Tom to wonder whether Jane was quite trustworthy. Not that he thought she was in any way politically active.
sentences.cn: 汤姆突然想到简是不是值得信任，并不是说他认为简有些热衷于政治。

sentences.en: Madeline is a superior, trustworthy girl.
sentences.cn: 梅德琳是个优秀而可靠的姑娘.

sentences.en: She was as secret and trustworthy as her son himself.
sentences.cn: 她正像她的儿子一样,懂得保守秘密,可以受人信托.

sentences.en: Sycophancy was the device of the least trustworthy.
sentences.cn: 阿谀奉承之辈最不可靠.

sentences.en: The caretaker of the warehouse was trustworthy.
sentences.cn: 那个看管仓库的人是很可靠的.

sentences.en: There was for him only one trustworthy road through deceptions and mirages.
sentences.cn: 对他来说只有一条可靠的路能避开幻想和错觉.

trans.tran_cn: 值得信赖的，可靠的，把稳，妥靠，信实
trans.tran_en: able to be trusted and depended on
